message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a bit more since I lose money to inflation each round.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the inflation factor. It gives you a decent amount and I get a little more for taking the risk of going to the next round.
Bob, this is a serious offer. I need to get a decent share due to inflation, but I'm willing to be slightly more generous than your last proposal. Take it or leave it.
